message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at $9,500. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price. While $8,200 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $8,850?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
